QuestData.Title: ...And Bury the Rest
QuestData.Description: It's not enough to kill 'em - after Bael'dun, I want to give those goblins a taste of their own.$B$BGo into Frazzlecraz's mine and arm a pile of the explosives inside.$B$BAt the entrance to the mine you should see some sort of switch or plunger. Once the explosives are armed, use the plunger to blow that place sky-high. Put the fear in 'em, $C!
QuestData.LogDescription: Arm 6 Frazzlecraz Explosives in the Frazzlecraz Motherlode mine.
